column4: Li'll question:  What is the name of  the "Mozilla SUITE"  for  apt-get  or aptitude?
I can only find firefox
but I need the mozila suite
I wanna get the browser "Mozilla"  which contains a WYSIWYG Editor (the composer)
that's old and defunct
Seamonkey is the new one
but I need the composer
right, but what you want is Seamonkey, not Mozilla
the suite is Seamonkey, the "just browser" is Firefox
"aptitude search seamonkey"  does NOT return any results
must not be in the repos
there was an editor called Nvu based on Mozilla Composer
yep but its also not in the repos
oh
well there are other wysiwygs in there
however
nvu's most recent release was Nvu Kompozer
and there are Ubuntu packages
where can I find them?
go to http://www.kompozer.net and there's a button on the right
Nutubuntu:  I installed  kompozer successfully  but the command to start it seems not to be "kompozer"
it didnt show in your menus?
add it back just for the sake of figuring it out
well it is a release of nvu so i guess that makes sense
